on reading compounds: 犬猿の仲【ケンエンノナカ】like cats and dogs, (on) very bad terms, relationship of dogs and monkeys
犬猿【ケンエン】cats and dogs (as an example of a bad relationship), dogs and monkeys
柴犬【シバイヌ】shiba (Japanese breed of dog), shiba inu, brushwood dog
ポメラニア犬【ポメラニアケン】Pomeranian (dog)
kun reading compounds: 犬【いぬ】dog (Canis (lupus) familiaris), snoop (i.e. a detective, a spy, etc.), loser, asshole, counterfeit, inferior, useless, wasteful
犬合わせ【いぬあわせ】dog fighting, dog fight
柴犬【しばいぬ】shiba (Japanese breed of dog), shiba inu, brushwood dog
